2024 年 5 月 3 日星期五 20:00:53 +0000 TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
你的伴侣是“那个人吗？”错误的问题 |乔治·布莱尔-韦斯特乔治·布莱尔-韦斯特Marrying for love is a relatively recent phenomenon for humanity, and we still don't fully understand what it means for building successful relationships, says author and psychiatrist George Blair-West. Drawing from his extensive experience working with couples, he shares four questions every couple should ask themselves before tying the knot — and highlights surprising findings on how the way marriage starts impacts if it ends.你的伴侣是“那个人吗？”错误的问题 |乔治·布莱尔-韦斯特Marrying for love is a relatively recent phenomenon for humanity, and we still don't fully understand what it means for building successful relationships, says author and psychiatrist George Blair-West. Drawing from his extensive experience working with couples, he shares four questions every couple should ask themselves before tying the knot — and highlights surprising findings on how the way marriage starts impacts if it ends. https://www.ted.com/talks/george_blair_west_is_your_partner_the_one_wrong_question?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127674 127674 Fri, 03 May 2024 14:44:49 +0000高等教育不00:15:28泰德
美国如何摧毁年轻人的未来|斯科特·加洛韦斯科特·加洛韦In a scorching talk, marketing professor and podcaster Scott Galloway dissects the data showing that, by many measures, young people in the US are worse off financially than ever before. He unpacks the root causes and effects of this "great intergenerational theft," asking why we let it continue and showing how we could make it end. (Note: This talk contains mature language.)美国如何摧毁年轻人的未来|斯科特·加洛韦In a scorching talk, marketing professor and podcaster Scott Galloway dissects the data showing that, by many measures, young people in the US are worse off financially than ever before. He unpacks the root causes and effects of this "great intergenerational theft," asking why we let it continue and showing how we could make it end. (Note: This talk contains mature language.) https://www.ted.com/talks/scott_galloway_how_the_us_is_destroying_young_people_s_future?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129805 129805 Thu, 02 May 2024 15:00:42 +0000高等教育不00:18:02泰德
如何治理人工智能——即使它很难预测 |海伦·托纳海伦·托纳No one truly understands AI, not even experts, says Helen Toner, an AI policy researcher and former board member of OpenAI. But that doesn't mean we can't govern it. She shows how we can make smart policies to regulate this technology even as we struggle to predict where it's headed — and why the right actions, right now, can shape the future we want.如何治理人工智能——即使它很难预测 |海伦·托纳No one truly understands AI, not even experts, says Helen Toner, an AI policy researcher and former board member of OpenAI. But that doesn't mean we can't govern it. She shows how we can make smart policies to regulate this technology even as we struggle to predict where it's headed — and why the right actions, right now, can shape the future we want. https://www.ted.com/talks/helen_toner_how_to_govern_ai_even_if_it_s_hard_to_predict?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129460 129460 Wed, 01 May 2024 14:50:34 +0000高等教育不00:11:12泰德
工人们在自然灾害后重建社区 |萨凯特·索尼萨凯特·索尼As climate change leads to more and more natural disasters, a group of workers is showing up at one site after another to rebuild and repair. Labor organizer Saket Soni tells the stories of Resilience Force — the group of mostly immigrant workers restoring homes after hurricanes, floods and fires — and describes the unexpected bonds developing between the residents whose lives have been turned upside down and the laborers helping put things back together.工人们在自然灾害后重建社区 |萨凯特·索尼As climate change leads to more and more natural disasters, a group of workers is showing up at one site after another to rebuild and repair. Labor organizer Saket Soni tells the stories of Resilience Force — the group of mostly immigrant workers restoring homes after hurricanes, floods and fires — and describes the unexpected bonds developing between the residents whose lives have been turned upside down and the laborers helping put things back together. https://www.ted.com/talks/saket_soni_the_workers_rebuilding_communities_after_natural_disasters?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:128041 128041 Wed, 01 May 2024 14:48:47 +0000高等教育不00:12:55泰德
我成为在澳大利亚划船最快的人的史诗般的旅程 |邦妮·汉考克邦妮·汉考克What challenges lie ahead of a staggering 12,700-kilometer paddle around the entire continent of Australia? Crocodiles and sharks were just the beginning, says Ironwoman Bonnie Hancock. Reflecting on her remarkable feat of becoming the fastest person to paddle around Australia, she shares lessons on perseverance, resilience and finding meaning in life's toughest moments.我成为在澳大利亚划船最快的人的史诗般的旅程 |邦妮·汉考克What challenges lie ahead of a staggering 12,700-kilometer paddle around the entire continent of Australia? Crocodiles and sharks were just the beginning, says Ironwoman Bonnie Hancock. Reflecting on her remarkable feat of becoming the fastest person to paddle around Australia, she shares lessons on perseverance, resilience and finding meaning in life's toughest moments. https://www.ted.com/talks/bonnie_hancock_my_epic_journey_becoming_the_fastest_person_to_paddle_around_australia?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:128758 128758 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 14:47:22 +0000高等教育不00:09:57泰德
人工智能如何解开自然和宇宙的秘密|黛米斯·哈萨比斯黛米斯·哈萨比斯Can AI help us answer life's biggest questions? In this visionary conversation, Google DeepMind cofounder and CEO Demis Hassabis delves into the history and incredible capabilities of AI with head of TED Chris Anderson. Hassabis explains how AI models like AlphaFold — which accurately predicted the shapes of all 200 million proteins known to science in under a year — have already accelerated scientific discovery in ways that will benefit humanity. Next up? Hassabis says AI has the potential to unlock the greatest mysteries surrounding our minds, bodies and the universe.人工智能如何解开自然和宇宙的秘密|黛米斯·哈萨比斯Can AI help us answer life's biggest questions? In this visionary conversation, Google DeepMind cofounder and CEO Demis Hassabis delves into the history and incredible capabilities of AI with head of TED Chris Anderson. Hassabis explains how AI models like AlphaFold — which accurately predicted the shapes of all 200 million proteins known to science in under a year — have already accelerated scientific discovery in ways that will benefit humanity. Next up? Hassabis says AI has the potential to unlock the greatest mysteries surrounding our minds, bodies and the universe. https://www.ted.com/talks/demis_hassabis_how_ai_is_unlocking_the_secrets_of_nature_and_the_universe?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129163 129163 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 14:33:21 +0000高等教育不00:25:30泰德
解决气候危机的最新行动计划——以及迄今为止的进展|瑞安·潘查萨拉姆、安贾利·格罗弗和大卫·比耶洛瑞安·潘查萨拉姆、安贾利·格罗弗和大卫·比耶洛When it comes to climate, what are we doing right and where should we focus our efforts next? Systems innovator Ryan Panchadsaram and strategist Anjali Grover talk with TED science curator David Biello about the latest on the world's progress toward solving the climate crisis — and why there's more reason for optimism than you might think. Using strategic goal-setting tools that have transformed countless organizations, Panchadsaram and Grover explore the urgent actions needed to steer the planet toward a sustainable future and the pivotal roles of innovation, investment and policy. "The climate story isn't yet written," Grover says.解决气候危机的最新行动计划——以及迄今为止的进展|瑞安·潘查萨拉姆、安贾利·格罗弗和大卫·比耶洛When it comes to climate, what are we doing right and where should we focus our efforts next? Systems innovator Ryan Panchadsaram and strategist Anjali Grover talk with TED science curator David Biello about the latest on the world's progress toward solving the climate crisis — and why there's more reason for optimism than you might think. Using strategic goal-setting tools that have transformed countless organizations, Panchadsaram and Grover explore the urgent actions needed to steer the planet toward a sustainable future and the pivotal roles of innovation, investment and policy. "The climate story isn't yet written," Grover says. https://www.ted.com/talks/ryan_panchadsaram_anjali_grover_and_david_biello_an_updated_action_plan_for_solving_the_climate_crisis_and_a_look_at_progress_to_date?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129465 129465 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 13:28:48 +0000高等教育不00:11:54泰德
商业成功的秘诀|皮特·斯塔夫罗斯皮特·斯塔夫罗斯Too often, employees are unmotivated and unhappy, with no real incentive to invest much of anything into their place of work. Investment expert Pete Stavros thinks there's a better way, and he's on a mission to rethink corporate structures to expand who benefits from a thriving company. Sharing personal stories of his own journey along with the profound impact doing this work effectively can have, this moving talk provides a blueprint for changing the narrative — and outlook — for millions of workers worldwide.商业成功的秘诀|皮特·斯塔夫罗斯Too often, employees are unmotivated and unhappy, with no real incentive to invest much of anything into their place of work. Investment expert Pete Stavros thinks there's a better way, and he's on a mission to rethink corporate structures to expand who benefits from a thriving company. Sharing personal stories of his own journey along with the profound impact doing this work effectively can have, this moving talk provides a blueprint for changing the narrative — and outlook — for millions of workers worldwide. https://www.ted.com/talks/pete_stavros_the_secret_ingredient_of_business_success?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129391 129391 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 14:47:50 +0000高等教育不00:13:03泰德
如何与火共存？欧乐麦奎尔欧乐麦奎尔Uncontrolled fire threatens nature — but the right kind of fire can maintain the health and balance of the land, says fire management expert Oral McGuire. As a leader in the Nyungar community of southwestern Australia and a former firefighter, he connects traditional wisdom with modern techniques to wield fire in a way that promotes biodiversity and heals the spirit of the land at the same time.如何与火共存？欧乐麦奎尔Uncontrolled fire threatens nature — but the right kind of fire can maintain the health and balance of the land, says fire management expert Oral McGuire. As a leader in the Nyungar community of southwestern Australia and a former firefighter, he connects traditional wisdom with modern techniques to wield fire in a way that promotes biodiversity and heals the spirit of the land at the same time. https://www.ted.com/talks/oral_mcguire_how_to_live_with_fire?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:128624 128624 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 15:01:29 +0000高等教育不00:11:02泰德
Niceaunties 怪异而美妙的艺术 |尼斯阿姨们尼斯阿姨们Welcome to the "Auntieverse" — a surreal tribute to "auntie culture" by artist Niceaunties, inspired by the spirit of the women who care for each other and their families. From sushi-bedecked cars with legs to hot tub baths full of ramen, Niceaunties shares a visual feast that fuses AI and imagination and celebrates the eccentric, vibrant world of aunties with reverence and awe. (Slides created with AI including Midjourney and DALL·E 3 for text-to-image creation; magnific.ai and Topaz Labs for upscaling the images; Pikalabs and Runwayml for animation.) 有说服力的讲故事的艺术 |凯利·D·帕克凯利·D·帕克"Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D. Parker. She explains how stories make proposals of all kinds more memorable — and shows how you can craft a compelling narrative to connect, persuade and drive meaningful action.有说服力的讲故事的艺术 |凯利·D·帕克"Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D.
